con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <s:element name="CheckTextRequest"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="text" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute name="lang" type="s:string"/> <s:attribute name="options" type="s:int" use="optional" default="0"/> <s:attribute name="format" type="s:string" use="optional" default=""/> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="CheckTextResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="SpellResult" type="tns:SpellResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="SpellResult"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="error" type="tns:SpellError"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="SpellError"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="word" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="s" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute name="code" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="pos" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="row" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="col" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="len" type="s:int" use="required"/> </s:complexType> <s:element name="CheckTextsRequest"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="text" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute name="lang" type="s:string"/> <s:attribute name="options" type="s:int" use="optional" default="0"/> <s:attribute name="format" type="s:string" use="optional" default=""/> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="CheckTextsResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="ArrayOfSpellResult" type="tns:ArrayOfSpellResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfSpellResult"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="SpellResult" type="tns:SpellResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="checkTextSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkTextSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkTextsSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextsRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkTextsSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SpellServiceSoap"> <wsdl:operation name="checkText"> <wsdl:input message="tns:checkTextSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:checkTextSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="checkTexts"> <wsdl:input message="tns:checkTextsSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:checkTextsSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SpellServiceSoap" type="tns:SpellServiceSoap"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="checkText"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkText" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="checkTexts"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkTexts" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="SpellServiceSoap12" type="tns:SpellServiceSoap"> <soap12:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="checkText"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkText" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="checkTexts"> <soap12:operation </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SpellService"> <wsdl:port name="SpellServiceSoap" binding="tns:SpellServiceSoap"> <soap:address location="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"/> </wsdl:port> <wsdl:port name="SpellServiceSoap12" binding="tns:SpellServiceSoap12"> <soap12:address location="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="?" options="0" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>?</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: ruCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#Project#RU}" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>Привет, меня зовут Маша.</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: enCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#Project#EN}" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>Hi, my name is Bob.</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ukCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#Project#UK}" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>Привіт, мене звати Маша.</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ruCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#Project#RU}" options="${#TestCase#FIND_REPEAT_WORDS}" format="">\r <spel:text>рыва72ры. поезд поехал поехал быстрее. пАриЖ. </spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: enCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#Project#EN}" options="${#TestCase#FIND_REPEAT_WORDS}" format="">\r <spel:text>sjfidue. the train went went faster. paris. </spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ukCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#Project#UK}" options="${#TestCase#FIND_REPEAT_WORDS}" format="">\r <spel:text>рива72ри. поїзд поїхав поїхав швидше. пАРиж.</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
switch (testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Lang")) { case '': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#RU}') break
case '${#Project#RU}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#EN}') break
case '${#Project#EN}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#UK}') break
case '${#Project#UK}': testRunner.gotoStepByName("clearProperties") break }

con:request.name: checkEmptyText
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#TestCase#Lang}" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text></spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: checkText
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="gr" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>sdfsdf</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
switch (testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Lang")) { case '': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#RU}') break
case '${#Project#RU}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#EN}') break
case '${#Project#EN}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#UK}') break
case '${#Project#UK}': testRunner.gotoStepByName("clearProperties") break }

con:request.name: checkTextWithDigits
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#TestCase#Lang}" options="${#TestCase#IGNORE_DIGITS}" format="">\r <spel:text>sdjf20j8 23ваоыш823 2348 jfапgd0</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ruCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#RU}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>стол стул Москва</spel:text> <spel:text>корова стоит в поле</spel:text> <spel:text>тридцать три корабля имеют 33 якоря</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: enCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#EN}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>table chair Moscow</spel:text> <spel:text>the cow is standing in the field</spel:text> <spel:text>thirty three ships have 33 anchors</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ukCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#UK}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>стіл стілець Москва</spel:text> <spel:text>корова коштує в поле</spel:text> <spel:text>тридцять три корабля мають 33 якоря</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
switch (testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Lang")) { case '': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#RU}') break
case '${#Project#RU}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#EN}') break
case '${#Project#EN}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#UK}') break
case '${#Project#UK}': testRunner.gotoStepByName("clearProperties") break }

import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils charset = (('a'..'z') + ('A'..'Z') + ('0'..'9')).join() length = 10 RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("URL", "https://".concat(RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray())).concat(".com").toString())

con:request.name: checkText
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="${#TestCase#Lang}" options="${#TestCase#IGNORE_URLS}" format="">\r <spel:text>${#TestCase#URL}</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ruCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#RU}" options="${#TestCase#IGNORE_CAPITALIZATION}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>москва</spel:text> <spel:text>КоРоВа</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: enCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#EN}" options="${#TestCase#IGNORE_CAPITALIZATION}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>moscow</spel:text> <spel:text>eXPression</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ukCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#UK}" options="${#TestCase#IGNORE_CAPITALIZATION}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>москва</spel:text> <spel:text>кОшТує</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ruCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#RU}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>карова</spel:text> <spel:text>лондон</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: enCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#EN}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>fother</spel:text> <spel:text>london</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ukCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#Project#UK}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>маам</spel:text> <spel:text>лондон</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
switch (testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Lang")) { case '': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#RU}') break
case '${#Project#RU}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#EN}') break
case '${#Project#EN}': testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lang", '${#Project#UK}') break
case '${#Project#UK}': testRunner.gotoStepByName("clearProperties") break }

con:request.name: checkEmptyText
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#Lang}" options="0" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
